OOP

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • OOP.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Cell represents a Cell object. It contains an integer representing the row number, and one representing the column number. It also contains a String holding the content
    Author:
    Jonathan
